p: Five plant samples including cumin ( Cuminumcyminum), black seeds ( Nigella sativa), cloves ( Syzygium aromaicum), cinnamon ( Cinnamomum zeylanicum), and marjoram ( Origanum Majorana) have been used in the treatment of beef meat samples. The powder samples were collected from the local market in Assiut city. The plant volatile oil samples were collected from National Research Centerâ€”Unit of oils extraction.
